title: Create Pod in Specific Namespace
description: Create a Pod named ns-pod using image busybox:1.31.0 in the kube-system namespace with command 'sleep 3600'.

steps: kubectl get pod ns-pod -n kube-system -o jsonpath='{.metadata.namespace}'

validations.command: kubectl get pod ns-pod -n kube-system -o jsonpath='{.metadata.namespace}'
validations.description: Pod should be in kube-system namespace
